patterns: (?:can you (?:please )?|will you (?:please )?)?suggest (?:me )an exam ordering (?:for|in) a cdl ?\??
(?:can you (?:please )?|will you (?:please )?)?suggest (?:me )an exam ordering (?:for|in) ([a-zA-Z ]+) year [1-3] semester [1-2] ?\??
(?:can you (?:please )?|will you (?:please )?)?suggest (?:me )an exam ordering to learn some topics (?:for|in) a cdl ?\??
(?:can you (?:please )?|will you (?:please )?)?suggest (?:me )an exam ordering to cover some topics (?:for|in) a cdl ?\??
(?:can you (?:please )?|will you (?:please )?)?suggest (?:me )an exam ordering for learing some topics (?:for|in) a cdl  ?\??
(?:can you (?:please )?|will you (?:please )?)?suggest (?:me )an exam ordering to learn some topics for ([a-zA-Z ]+) ?\??
(?:can you (?:please )?|will you (?:please )?)?suggest (?:me )an exam ordering to learn ([a-zA-Z ]+(?:,[a-zA-Z ]+)*) for ([a-zA-Z ]+) ?\??
(?:can you (?:please )?|will you (?:please )?)?show (?:me )suggested books for a teaching ?\??
(?:can you (?:please )?|will you (?:please )?)?show (?:me )the teachings for a cdl ?\??
(?:can you (?:please )?|will you (?:please )?)?show (?:me )covered topics for a teaching ?\??
what can you do for me?\?
